value:
$WmMPID_双界カアラ,ch03_19_Karla_FF_Pair,Face|King Michalis, I heard about the
situation from Princess Minerva.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|That is none of your concern.$k$p$WmMPID_双界カアラ,ch03_19_Karla_FF_Pair,Face|I have had my share of
misunderstandings with
my brother...$k$pThere are some matters on which
neither of us will concede, but...$k$pI would like to think there are also
points where we might find some
compromise.$k$pI believe you and Princess Minerva
are in a similar situation.$k$p$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|Why is it you insist on meddling
in their affairs, Karla? What concerns
you so?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|...Compromise, hm?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_SpringFes23,Face|Looks like everyone is here,
Bernadetta! Let's do the best
we can out there!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_SpringFes23,Face|Mrrgh...$k$pI don't even want these eggs!
Why can't we collect them from
chickens like normal people?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_SpringFes23,Face|...We may have had a better chance
at success if we'd let her sleep.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Why don't we go over to where
Michalis is, Sister?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|...I am sorry, Maria. I know you were
looking forward to spending time
with the three of us together.$k$pBut we should give him some space.
He needs to decide how it is he
wishes to proceed.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|...$k$p...Oh! Michalis! You're here!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Well, this is a shock.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|There you two are.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Wow! So many beautiful eggs!$k$pOh my! There are candies inside!$k$pThank you, Michalis!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Is this the prize from the egg-hunting
tournament? I take it you chose to
participate, Michalis?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|...Should I not have? It is the festival's
main event, isn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|It is just...an unexpected turn
of events.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|Well, I... I would like to spend some
time with you today. Both of you.
That's all.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|I'm glad to hear that, Michalis...
I feel the same.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Me too!$k$pCould we maybe...all hold hands?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Of course.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|...Just for today.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Yay! This is the best day ever!$k$pThere is so much I want to see
around the festival. The food stalls,
the exhibition tournaments...$k$pHeehee. We're going to have so
much fun today! I wish this festival
could last forever...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Heh... Yes, that would be nice.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|If only it could be so...$k$p$Sbs150|
